short_summary: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) seeks NSA Interconnecting Office Panels for the Canada Border Services Agency (CBSA)
description: Public Works and Government Services Canada (PWGSC) is issuing this Request for Proposal for Canada Border Services Agency (CBSA), for the acquisition of NSA Interconnecting Office Panels including delivery and installation to Montreal, Quebec. All details related to the requirement are found in the solicitation.
full_summary:
**Government Tender Announcement**
=====================================================

### Title
**NSA Interconnecting Office Panels for Canada Border Services Agency (CBSA)**

### Summary
Public Works and Government Services Canada (PWGSC) is issuing a Request for Proposal (RFP) for the acquisition of [NSA Interconnecting Office Panels](http://) for the Canada Border Services Agency (CBSA). The RFP is soliciting bids for the delivery and installation of these panels to Montreal, Quebec.

### Tender Information
=====================================

*   **Solicitation Number** (nbr de sola): WS4200123198
*   **Publication Date**: 2023-09-11
*   ** Tender Closing Date**: 2023-10-05 14:00:00 EST
*   **Trade Agreements**: Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA), Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA), Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
*   **Regions of Delivery**: Montreal
*   **Engineering Procurement Category**: Goods
*   **Procurement Method**: Competitive - Open Bidding

### Technical Specifications
=====================================================

The following UNSPSC codes apply:

*   56101700: Office furniture
*   56111601: Screens for panel systems
*   56111606: Parts or accessories panel systems
*   56112201: Desk based screens
*   56112206: Desking systems related parts and accessories

### Evaluation Method
=====================

The [Lowest Price](http://) evaluation method will be used to select the successful bidder.

### Contact Information
=====================

Lavoie, Corine (PWGSC) (elle-la / she-her)

Email: [corine.lavoie@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:corine.lavoie@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)

[Notice URL](http://): https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/17413183?extsite=MTc0MTMxODNfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==

**End of Notice**
